io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.impl

Class GroupChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.impl.Channel
      • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.impl.GroupChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannel, ITextChannel

    public class GroupChannel
extends Channel
implements ITextChannel
    Represents a GroupDMChannel on discord. GroupChannels are only available for user accounts, not bot accounts.
    Author:
    Perry Berman
